message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
My turn, Alice. Let's be realistic - I propose a 55/45 split.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 57/43 split. It's closer to my initial offer and better for both of us than dragging this out further.
Alice, time is running out! I'm offering you 4800. Take it or leave it.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this. 55/45 is my final offer. Let's close this deal before the money shrinks even further.
